abstract: Basketball Roundup; Brooklyn Nets general manager Billy King says he hopes to improve team from within, but does not rule out trade.
lead_paragraph: Nets General Manager Billy King said he was looking to improve his team from within, but he did not rule out a trade to complement the team’s current core.

headline.main: Keeping Brook Lopez Is Priority for Nets

snippet: Nets General Manager Billy King said he was looking to improve his team from within, but he did not rule out a trade to complement the team’s current core.
